entity attribute definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class
A functional description of the tag
note / comment: The description can also include the parent tag, where required.   It should not include tag class, manufacturer and model information.

entity attribute definition: The full name of a tag
note / comment: Different companies have different tag naming conventions. A tag name shall be unique within a plant.

entity attribute definition: A requisition number that has been placed to acquire the tag
An identification of the engineering phase in which the tag is

attribute name: equipment expected to be installed indicator
entity attribute definition: An indication whether equipment are expected to be installed for tags that are associated with this tag class
note / comment: This is redundant with the tag class and equipment class relationship : the absence of that relationship would mean no equipment is expected to be installed. NO would be used when soft tags, civil tags (e.g. roads), ...

entity attribute definition: The full name of the tag class
An expression that represents the format of the tags belonging to the tag class
note / comment: This allows companies to have specific tag formats

entity attribute definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class
The full name of the tag or equipment class
An expression that represents the format of the tags belonging to the tag class
note / comment: This allows companies to have specific tag formats that depends on the equipment classes

attribute name: tag or equipment class relationship reason for mapping
entity attribute definition: The underlying reason why the tag class and the equipment class are related
The name of the property that applies to a tag or equipment class
The full name of the non abstract tag or equipment class to which the property applies
A unique identifier, assigned in the CFIHOS Reference Data Library (RDL) to the tag or equipment class
note / comment: CFIHOS unique code are unique across all types of objects in CFIHOS RDL The initial set of values will be the CFIHOS unique ids that were assigned to tagclasses

entity attribute definition: An indication whether the tag or equipment class is an aggregation of other tag or equipment classes and should not be used for associating properties
An indication that the tag or equipment class is considered as an equipment class

attribute name: parent tag or equipment class name
entity attribute definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class
note / comment: The parent is actually mandatory for all classes, except the one at the top of the hierarchy

entity attribute definition: The code, assigned in the coding source, to the object that is equivalent to the CFIHOS object
A unique identifier, assigned in the CFIHOS Reference Data Library (RDL) to an object in the CFIHOS RDL
The system that has been assigning codes to objects relevant to CFIHOS
A code that uniquely identifies a country, according to ISO 3166-1
The name assigned by ISO to the country, in its 3166-1 standard
A code that uniquely identifies a currency, as per ISO 4217
The name that is assigned to the ISO currency
The code by which ISO designates a language, in its ISO639-1 standard
The name that ISO assigns to a language, in its ISO639-1 standard
The language in which is expressed the additional file
The unique identifier for the document according to the Owner/Operator document numbering scheme, to which the additional file is associated
A code used to identify the content of a document at a certain point in time according to the Owner/Operator Document Revision Coding scheme
note / comment: It is used to track the evolution of a document during its lifecycle and is applied at time of release from Originator to reflect the document is frozen.

entity attribute definition: The unique name of the electronic file (including its extension)
A description in a short and concise manner of the content of the additional file
note / comment: This is not meant to repeat the document title. The FILE_TITLE shall be unique within a particular document revision. Refer to the chapter Set of Files for more information.

entity attribute definition: The type of media used to store the content of the additional file
A code that uniquely identifies an application condition
A description of what the application condition represents
The value against which a property must be compared to know if the application condition is met
A code that uniquely identifies the comparison operator
The name of the property the application condition refers to
The full name of the non abstract tag or equipment class to which the property applies
The unit of measure in which a numeric property associated with the application condition is expressed
A code that uniquely identifies a group of application conditions
A description of what the application condition group represents
A code that uniquely identifies an application condition that is member of the application condition group
A code that uniquely identifies a group of application conditions this is a member of
A code that uniquely identifies the area within the plant
A name describing the location of an area within the plant
The plant the area is part of
A code that uniquely identifies the type of asset
A description of what the asset type represents
A description of what that coding source is
A code that uniquely identifies the system that has been assigning codes to objects relevant to CFIHOS
A code that uniquely identifies the commissioning unit within a plant
The name by which the commission unit is usually designated
A code that uniquely identifies the parent of the commission unit at the plant
The plant the commissioning unit is part of
The country where the company address is located
The first line of the address of the company
The second line of the address of the company
The third line of the address of the company
The name of the person to contact in the company
A description of the role of the contact person within the organization of the company.
The official email address of the company
The official fax number of the company
A name used to uniquely identify the company
note / comment: It is sometimes extracted from maintenance management system. The owner / operator and the EPC company need to align on the name of companies.

entity attribute definition: The official telephone number of the company
An indicator whether the company is a manufacturer or not
An indicator whether the company is a supplier or not
A code that uniquely identifies the comparison operator
The description of what the comparison operator represents
A code that uniquely identifies the construction assembly at a plant
A name describing the purpose of a construction assembly
A code that uniquely identifies the parent of a construction assembly at a plant
The plant at which the construction assembly is constructed

A description of what the corrosion loop is

A description of what the data type code represents

A description of what the deliverable format represents

entity attribute definition: The discipline a discipline document type refers to
A comment about this discipline and document type
At alternate way of identifying uniquely a combination of discipline and document type
note / comment: This attribute is calculated as a concatenetion of the discipline code and the document type short code

entity attribute definition: The type of review to be conducted for the documents classified with this document type and this discipline
The document type a discipline document type refers to
The representation type that should be used for documents of this type, for this discipline
An indicator which specifies if documents classified with this document type require a paper hardcopy. during project and/or after project
The format under which the native document should be provided
note / comment: In the RDL, this information will be left blank. It is the responsibility of each owner / operator to specify the format under which the native file should be provided.

entity attribute definition: The format under which the native document should be provided
An indicator which specifies if documents classified with this document type have to be translated in another language. during project and/or after project.
The discipline to which refers the discipline document type requirement

The document type to which refers this discipline document type requirement
The event prior to which document types for a given discipline have to be handed over

entity attribute definition: A description of what that group of vendor document and data requirements represents

attribute name: document and data requirement type code

entity attribute definition: A description of what the document and data requirement represents

A description of what the document format represents

A description, in a short and concise manner, of the content of the document
note / comment: The title of the document usually appears on the front page of the document or in title block.

entity attribute definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued for approval
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

entity attribute definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued approved for construction
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

entity attribute definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued for review
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

entity attribute definition: A code that uniquely identifies the document representation type
A description of what the document representation type is or represents

A description of what the document retention period represents
A code that uniquely identifies a document review type
A description of what the document review type represents
The primary language that the document revision is written in

The date at which the document revision has been issued approved for construction
The date at which the document revision has been issued approved for design
The date at which the document revision has been issued as-built
The date on which the document revision  was actually reviewed
The document master to which this revision is related
The name (or the User ID) of the person who has approved the document revision
The name of the person who created the document revision
note / comment: This should be an individual name, not a role, i.e. Initials and last name, not just initials

entity attribute definition: A code used to identify the content of a document at a certain point in time
note / comment: It is used to track the evolution of a document during its lifecycle and is applied at time of release from Originator to reflect the document is frozen.

entity attribute definition: Any additional comment / explanation for a document revision
The date the document was revised
The name of the electronic file (including the file extension) with the full path
note / comment: The file name shall consist of the document number, Document revision and a sequence number followed by the file extension. When this attribute is populated the attribute physical storage location shall be left empty.

entity attribute definition: The location of a media when not stored as an electronic file
The full name of the recipient of the document. revision
The status of the document revision
note / comment: A document is classified by a single state, which changes as the document advances through this lifecycle.

entity attribute definition: The Export Control Rule that is applicable for the document revision (e.g., ECCN, EAR)
The name of the company who has generated the document revision
The unique identifier for the Document according to the originator document numbering scheme
note / comment: One potential use is to allow Owner/Operator to identify duplicate documents provided by multiple subcontractors but from the same OEM.

entity attribute definition: A code used to identify the content of a document at a certain point in time according to the  originator which doesn't necessarily conform to the Owner/Operator's document revision coding scheme
note / comment: One potential use is to allow Owner/Operator to identify duplicate documents provided by multiple subcontractors but from the same OEM.

entity attribute definition: The name of the file as provided by the manufacturer
note / comment: Remark: One potential use is to allow Owner/Operator to identify duplicate documents provided by multiple subcontractors but from the same OEM. This document shall not contain any project specific cover page, but only the manufacturer cover page.

note / comment: This date is usually supplied by the manufacturer.

entity attribute definition: A name used to uniquely identify the company. who manufactures the equipment
note / comment: This name would be often derived from the manufacturer of the model / part, if it has been defined

An indicator whether the propert y should be provided for a given equipment
note / comment: It is important to distinguish the properties that should be provided by the EPC for an equipment, but e.g. not for a model. For instance, the color of a car is relevant for a given instance of a car, but not for the model.

attribute name: property relevant for model / part indicator
entity attribute definition: An indication whether the property must by provided by the EPC (or the manufacturer) for a given model
note / comment: Some properties should be reported for the models / parts associated with an equipment class, some for the equipment associated with the equipment class. Those are two separate pieces of data.

entity attribute definition: A code used to identify uniquely the equipment
The value of that property for this equipment.
note / comment: Id the value is numeric it should be qualified by a unit of measure. If it is not numeric, and the property is associated with a pick list, then it should be a valid entry from that pick list set of values.

entity attribute definition: A name that uniquely identifies the property

note / comment: The discipline / document type documented from the RDL could be overwriten by the Owner / Operator .

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: document and data requirement group code
entity attribute definition: A code that uniquely identifies the group to which a vendor document and data requirement belongs

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: document and data requirement type code
entity attribute definition: A code that uniquely identifies the type of document and data requirement

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
entity attribute definition: A code that uniquely identifies a format that a document can take

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
entity attribute definition: The document type a discipline document type refers to

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
entity attribute definition: The chapter of the engineering standard from which originates the VDDR

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
entity attribute definition: A code used to designate the standard used to define requirements like engineering, operations, etc

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: source standard document and data requirement comment
entity attribute definition: A remark that the originator of the document and data requirement for this source standard wanted to capture

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: source standard document and data requirement description
entity attribute definition: A precise description, as documented in the engineering standard, of the VDDR in term of what the content of the document shall be

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: source standard document and data requirement number
entity attribute definition: A number, assigned sequentially, to associate the VDDR to the engineering standard

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: source standard document and data requirement title
entity attribute definition: The title, as spelled in the engineering standard, of the VDDR

entity name: source standard document and data requirement
attribute name: source standard document and data requirement typical deliverable
entity attribute definition: A short description of the information deliverable that would typically include this document and data requirement
note / comment: This field uses CFIHOS naming as much as possible, and is aligned as much as possible withthe JIP33 library of typical deliverable.

entity name: source standard document and data requirement condition
entity attribute definition: A code that uniquely identifies an application condition

entity name: source standard document and data requirement condition
entity attribute definition: The value the condition must have for the documentation and data requirement to be applicable

entity attribute definition: A code used to designate the standard used to define requirements like engineering, operations, etc
constraint must be present in: source standard document and data requirement

entity attribute definition: An indication whether a source standard document and data requirement should be included or excluded of the condition is met

attribute name: submission reference is after event type indicator
entity attribute definition: An indicator whether the submission reference date is after the even type or not

The geographical area within the plant where the tag is located
The unit that will or has commissioned the tag
note / comment: This should be a leaf node commissioning unit.

entity attribute definition: The construction assembly of a plant where the tag resides
note / comment: This should be a leaf node construction assembly.

entity attribute definition: The corrosion loop that includes the tag
The company responsible for the design of the tag
The maintenance system through which the tag is maintained
The unit that is in charge of maintaining the tag
An identification of the parentage of the tag
note / comment: The parent tag (also called main tag) can be a package, an instrument loop or an electrical circuit.

entity attribute definition: The plant where the tag is or will be located
The process unit within the plant to which the tag provides part of the functionality
An indication whether the loss of the functionality provided by the tag would have an immediate cost impact, like a loss of production
The safety critical item group assigned to the tag, and identified according to International Standard
note / comment: This is only required if safety critical item indicator =Yes.

entity attribute definition: An indication whether the tag should be considered as a safety critical element, as per International Standards
A documentation of the outcome of the SCE assessment
note / comment: This is only required if safety critical item indicator =Yes.  It is populated according to International Standard.

entity attribute definition: An indication that the tag or equipment class is considered as a tag class
A definition of what the tag or equipment class is

attribute name: tag or equipment class existence reason description
entity attribute definition: An explanation of why the tag or equipment class was created / needed
note / comment: RDL management attribute, not shared contractually with contractors

entity attribute definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class
The SI (metric) unit of measure recommended for the property of this tag or equipment class
The Imperial unit of measure recommended for the property of this tag or equipment class

The name of the property that applies to a tag or equipment class
The name of the property in the source standard document

The section of the source standard in which the property is documented
The full name of the non abstract tag or equipment class to which the property applies
